# renderingMode

**Instance Property**

A setting that determines how the app renders an image.

## Declaration

```swift
var renderingMode: UIImage.RenderingMode { get }
```

## Discussion

The default rendering mode is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIImage/RenderingMode-swift.enum/automatic].

## Getting rendering information

- **UIImage.RenderingMode**: Constants that specify the possible rendering modes for an image.
- **imageRendererFormat**: The preferred image renderer format for the image.
